translation.en: Still time to change your mind.
Like a race to see who'd die first.
Terminal patient outlives the rest of humanity.
Someone should put you in a medical journal.
If you stop the transfusions, you won't last a week.
translation.ja: 輸血をやめれば７日で死ぬぞ

translation.en: If I was in a hurry to die, I'd go with you.
translation.ja: 一緒に行けば もっと早く死ぬ

translation.en: - We all want to be home. - Where is that?
translation.ja: 帰りたいだろ どこへ？

translation.en: Well, for you, I guess that's here.
As good a place as any.
- My little girl is missing! - What?
- I can't find my daughter. She isn't here. - What's the problem?
They put her on another helicopter. I saw her.
translation.ja: 別のヘリに乗せられて

translation.en: - What? She was alone? - No, with Doctor Rogg.
translation.ja: ひとりで？ ロッグ先生と

translation.en: He said to tell you he will meet you on the ground.
- We have to go. - Come on.
Nobody gave me a list. I just put people on the chopper.
translation.ja: ありません　乗せてるだけで

translation.en: In our galaxy alone, there are billions of stars,
translation.ja: 銀河系には 無数の星があります

translation.en: each one a sun to its own solar system.
And most of those suns have planets,
so it stands to reason that
of these hundreds of billions of exoplanets that exist in our galaxy,
translation.ja: 無数の惑星のうち 少なくとも１つは

translation.en: at least one of them has the potential to support life.
translation.ja: 生命を維持できる 可能性があります

translation.en: This is K- 23, Jupiter's previously undiscovered moon.
translation.ja: これはＫｰ23 木星の未踏の衛星です

translation.en: Not quite an exoplanet. The moon's atmosphere is governed not by the sun, but by its thermal volcanic activity.
translation.ja: 大気は太陽ではなく 火山活動に支配されています

translation.en: In simpler terms, when studying K- 23's lunar spectrum, its biomarkers and water vapors,
translation.ja: Ｋｰ23のスペクトルや 水蒸気を調べてみると

translation.en: it appears as though it's being heated from the inside out.
translation.ja: 内側から 温められているようです

translation.en: While further probing will need to test for atmospheric habitability,
translation.ja: 居住性の調査も必要ですが

translation.en: we can confidently say that based on its mass, radial velocity, and orbit,
translation.ja: 質量や視線速度 軌道などから判断すれば―

translation.en: I haven't met him personally, but I gathered research for his partner years ago, read his papers.
translation.ja: 会ってはいませんが リサーチの手伝いを
ああ　行ったことは？
ウイスキーを　君は？

translation.en: There's a place called Portobello Beach. - Have you heard of this? - No.
translation.ja: ポートベロー･ビーチは？

translation.en: It's so beautiful. You should go there. Just off the coast near Edinburgh.
translation.ja: とてもきれいよ エディンバラの近く

translation.en: In the height of summer, it's probably gonna be raining.
translation.ja: 夏は雨が多いから 評判は悪いわ

translation.en: - It's a tourist trap. - Yeah, I'm sure.
translation.ja: 夏は雨が多いから 評判は悪いわ だろうね

translation.en: You should go to the beach.

translation.ja: でも海岸は見て ああ

translation.en: But, um, while I have you, can I ask you a very serious question about your very serious book?
translation.ja: あなたの真面目な本について 聞いていい？

translation.en: How much of what you're searching for is reality,
translation.ja: あの本に 書いてあることの―

translation.en: and how much of your planet is just bullshit?
translation.ja: どれだけが事実で どれだけがウソ？
ネオワイズ 活動停止
ボイジャー３ 活動停止
国際宇宙ステーション 撤退
オリオン２ 活動停止
ジオフェン３ 活動停止

translation.en: How long till Aether's in range for direct contact?
Aether will be in range in 11 hours and 54 minutes.
- Set an alarm for notification. - Alarm is set.
translation.ja: アラームを セット

translation.en: I'm awake. How are you feeling?
- Morning, Sully. - I'm not speaking to you.
translation.ja: サリー 話したくない

translation.en: I had a dream you left me on K- 23, so I'm not talking to you.
translation.ja: 夢で置き去りにされたから

translation.en: - You started early. - Champions never rest.
translation.ja: 早いのね 俺は王者だぞ

translation.en: You still trying to beat your boys' times?
- They pay you to distract me, don't they? - Nah, I do it for free.
translation.ja: 邪魔してる？ そのとおり

translation.en: - You hear anything from home? - I'm trying.
translation.ja: 交信できた？ 努力してる
サンチェス おはよう
何かあった？ 何もなし

translation.en: This is Aether Mission K- 23, open on all channels.
translation.ja: こちらＫｰ23ミッションの アイテル号です

translation.en: - What's she hearing? - What frequency is this?
translation.ja: 何だ？ 周波数帯域は？

translation.en: I'm running S, X, and Ka.
- That puts our last contact-- - Including the control blackout?
translation.ja: 最後の接触は… 交信が途絶えて３週間よ
交信が途絶えて３週間よ

translation.en: If Mojave goes offline, then Spain or Australia immediately grabs the signal. No gaps. We're not receiving anything.
translation.ja: モハベの接続が切れても 他国が信号を拾うのに

translation.en: I've taken everything apart, rebooted it a dozen times, and nothing works.
translation.ja: 分析して再起動したけど ダメだった

translation.en: I also couldn't make contact with the K- 23 colony flight,
translation.ja: Ｋｰ23コロニー船とも 交信不能

translation.en: which should've been in the air a week ago.
I mean, it could be atmospheric,
RF pollution, or maybe a geomagnetic storm.
translation.ja: ＲＦ汚染か磁気嵐の可能性が

translation.en: But none of that could last this long or disrupt both hemispheres.
translation.ja: でも両半球で こんなには続かないわ

translation.en: Hello, this is Barbeau Observatory. A family member has been left behind.
translation.ja: こちら天文台 子供が取り残されてる

translation.en: Somebody needs to come back for her.
Hello, this is Barbeau Observatory. An outpost child has been left. Sh--
translation.ja: こちらバーボー天文台 職員の子供が…

translation.en: She's a-- She's an unidentified child.
translation.ja: 女の子だが… 身元が分からない

translation.en: She's seven or eight. She's alone.
Somebody has to come back. Sh--
Somebody's gotta be coming back for you, because I can't help you.
translation.ja: 誰か来ないと… 私には助けられん

translation.en: You have any brothers or sisters?
You're not deaf, right? You can hear me talking?
You just want to piss me off.
What is that? Is that an iris?
Aether is within direct contact range. There are no incoming messages.
translation.ja: アイテルが通信圏内です メッセージはありません

translation.en: Come in, Aether. This is Barbeau Observatory.
translation.ja: アイテル こちらバーボー天文台
こちらバーボー天文台

translation.en: Come in, Aether. This is Barbeau Observatory.
translation.ja: アイテル 私の声が聞こえるか？

translation.en: Come in, Aether. This is Barbeau Observatory. Are you receiving this?
translation.ja: アイテル 私の声が聞こえるか？
応答せよ　アイテル

translation.en: This is Barbeau Observatory. Are you receiving this?
translation.ja: こちら天文台　聞こえるか？
宇宙船だよ はるか かなた

translation.en: coming back from a planet that we--
we hoped would be our future, but…
Things didn't quite turn out that way.
That's why I have to contact them.
The antenna's our problem. It's not strong enough.
translation.ja: アンテナに障害がある

translation.en: Doesn't matter what direction we put it in.
They're not answering us because they can't hear us.
translation.ja: 声が届かなきゃ答えられない

translation.en: Given all the variables, the fact that we can't contact the K- 23 colony flight
translation.ja: どの周波数でも コロニー船と交信できず―

translation.en: and can't raise Mojave on any frequency,
translation.ja: モハベとも繋がらない

translation.en: that the fault lies with us.
But we have exhausted every possible trouble area on our side
translation.ja: だが問題とおぼしき箇所を 精査しても―

translation.en: If this were a less experienced crew, this ship would be in full- blown panic.
translation.ja: 新人のクルーなら パニックになったな

translation.en: Mission Specialist Sullivan is now breaking every protocol
translation.ja: サリーは プロトコルを無視して―

translation.en: as she attempts to make any kind of contact,

translation.ja: 中国やインドばかりか―

translation.en: This action is under my direction.
simply the best flier there is, but he's anxious to get home.
translation.ja: 最高の操縦士だが 家に帰りたがってる

translation.en: Maya and Sanchez are on 12- hour shifts as they boot and reboot the comms system,
translation.ja: マヤとサンチェスは シフト制で 通信システムを監視

translation.en: Overall, the crew's spirit remains high as we near the end of our journey.
translation.ja: 旅の終盤でも クルーの士気は高い

translation.en: Our two- year mission to K- 23
has us returning with more answers than questions.
translation.ja: 多くの答えを持ち帰る 〝ミッション軌道〞

translation.en: Can it sustain life? Yes. Can it expand? Yes.
translation.ja: 生命の維持は？　できる

translation.en: Could it be home? Yes, it could.
Every question we set out to answer, we did…
translation.ja: あらゆる答えを見つけた

translation.en: except the one that lingers in the air.
translation.ja: だが これだけは分からない

translation.en: Your breakfast has timed out. Would you like another?
translation.ja: “朝食”は終了 もう一度 見ますか？
いや　もう食べ終わる

translation.en: Doesn't make much sense to me either.
You know, there's no rule that says you have to touch everything.
It's the most important star in the sky.
If you ever get lost, it'll help you find your way.
translation.ja: 道に迷ったとき役立つ

translation.en: I called you. You didn't answer.
translation.ja: 電話したのに出なかった

translation.en: Can't answer your phone when you're working?
I called to tell you I'm not pregnant.
possible sighting of a life- form that ultimately proved false.
translation.ja: 生命体の目撃は誤りだった

translation.en: You want to be an explorer, Augustine.
translation.ja: あなたは探検家として―

translation.en: To discover new worlds, to… give life some hope.
translation.ja: 新世界を発見して 未来を託したい

translation.en: But while you're doing all that, your own life is just slipping away.
translation.ja: でも その代償として 自分の人生をすり減らしてく
それが私を悲しませるの

translation.en: I'm sure it's for the best.
It shouldn't be up this far.
There is an antenna that's stronger than ours.
translation.ja: 強力なアンテナがある

translation.en: It's protected by this mountain range.
So the air might still be good.
We get to that antenna, somebody'll hear us.
It's all right. You have to.
Never take it off, no matter what.

translation.ja: 鼻が鳴ったの　クンクンって

translation.en: Then I heard this voice that was like, Oh, damn, you smell good.
translation.ja: そして“いい匂い”って 声が聞こえた

translation.en: - What? - And it was the guy!
- No way, you're lying. - Why would I lie?
- He did that? - No, he didn't.
- Oh my God. He did that? - Yeah, he did.
So, what? He was behind you?
He was right behind me. He came down onto my neck.
translation.ja: 後ろにいて私の首筋に…

translation.en: It's okay. You can come in.
And that is my very, very best friend from high school.
translation.ja: あっちは高校からの 大親友なの

translation.en: He turns up. - Wait for it.

translation.ja: 世界一賢い猫 アインシュタイン

translation.en: I'm so sorry for so many things.
translation.ja: いろいろ すまなかった

translation.en: Do you want to change games?
translation.ja: やめる？ 私は幸運の連続だけど

translation.en: - I'm on about a two- month winning streak. - I'm pacing myself.
translation.ja: やめる？ 私は幸運の連続だけど 気楽にやるよ

translation.en: I got into NASA 'cause I was damn good at mathematics.
translation.ja: 数学が得意で ＮＡＳＡに入った

translation.en: Now, I don't like to use the word prodigy, but--
translation.ja: 数学が得意で ＮＡＳＡに入った いわゆる“神童”で…

translation.en: Yeah, I read your bio. You also broke the family dog's leg when you strapped it to a wooden rocket.
translation.ja: 木製ロケットに犬を縛って 脚を折ったでしょ

translation.en: - That's irrelevant. - Not to the dog.
translation.ja: それが？ 犬が気の毒

translation.en: Did you know there are over 60 billion possible combinations of rummy hands at the start of the game?
translation.ja: ラミーの手の組み合わせは 600億とおり以上ある

translation.en: So this little streak you're on…
A streak that's lasted from one side of the universe to the other.
translation.ja: 宇宙の端から端まで続いてる

translation.en: …is nothing more than a minuscule blip of luck
translation.ja: わずかな幸運にすぎないが

translation.en: among 60 billion possible combinations. But when you apply…
translation.ja: 600億の 組み合わせの中で…

translation.en: genius- level math skills to the equation,
translation.ja: 天才的なスキルを使えば

translation.en: you can shift those combinations to your favor.
translation.ja: 組み合わせを 有利にシフトできる

translation.en: Hmm. And that is what you're doing now?
You, my friend, are what my fellow mathematicians refer to as… a simpleton.
translation.ja: 君は俺の数学仲間が 言うところの―

translation.en: - We've deviated off course. - How far?
Can't tell yet. Auto- deactivated at some point.
Shut us down. Kill the engines before we get completely sideways.
translation.ja: エンジンを切れ　逸脱するぞ

translation.en: - Problem with navigation. - So we're off course. How far?
translation.ja: ナビに異常 逸脱距離は？

translation.en: Okay, we'll need to figure that out.
What is the variance for the alarm?
- 0.4 degrees. - And it sounded for what? 80 seconds?
- At 30,000 miles per hour. - Plus coast speed after engine kill.
translation.ja: 時速４万8000キロ プラス惰力

translation.en: - Non- existent without comms. - Sanchez, shut off the alarm.
translation.ja: 無理よ 警報を切れ
サリー　何の音がする？

translation.en: Jupiter probes, the beacon we left behind at K- 23,
translation.ja: 木星探査機に Ｋ-23のビーコン

translation.en: the supply probe on its way there now, some dying satellites--
translation.ja: 供給探査機と 機能停止の人工衛星

translation.en: We can reference the K- 23 beacon as our starting point.
translation.ja: Ｋ-23のビーコンを 出発点にすれば…

translation.en: We can still build a course from there to the satellite.
Sully, get him exact numbers on the beacon and pulse.
translation.ja: ビーコンとパルスの数値を

translation.en: Maya, help Sanchez with the course design.
translation.ja: マヤ　サンチェスを手伝え

translation.en: And move fast. We're drifting while we work.

translation.ja: 10のモデルと 10のマッチング結果

translation.en: Yeah, but it puts us in zones that haven't been cleared for passage.
translation.ja: しかし通過するには 危険なゾーンだ

translation.en: Well, we know there was meteor activity here, and we can avoid that, but…
translation.ja: この辺りの流星活動は 避けられるが…

translation.en: Anyone else have a better idea of how to get home?

translation.ja: よし　そのコースだ

translation.en: Okay, boss, but I sure don't like passing through zones that haven't been cleared.
translation.ja: 未知の領域は心配だよ
もうチェックしなくていい

translation.en: No need to keep checking it. The air is safe here.
translation.ja: もうチェックしなくていい 安心しろ
気をつけて　さよなら

translation.en: Come on, then. Let's get you in the car. Come on.
My, uh… My father had a stroke, so we wanted to spend time with him.
translation.ja: 父が脳卒中で倒れて 一緒にいたわ
まあ… それが人生よ

translation.en: Did you tell her about me?
If you want her to know about you, you can introduce yourself.
translation.ja: 名乗りたいなら自己紹介を
元気でね　オーガスティン

translation.en: You know, this machine was actually designed to detect alien life- forms that might invade our system.
translation.ja: このマシンは体内に侵入した エイリアンを検出できるの

translation.en: You wanna know if it's a girl or a boy?
I just didn't see this coming.
translation.ja: まさか こうなるとは

translation.en: Are you saying I couldn't help myself?
- No, you said that, not me. - Did I say that?
I didn't see it coming either.
So, what are we gonna name her?
translation.ja: それで どんな名前にする？

translation.en: I knew a face like that once.
Yeah. Her hair was a little different shade, but…
She was as loud as you are quiet.
When she'd laugh, everybody would turn and look.
translation.ja: 笑うと人が振り返って

translation.en: I think she'd laugh so much
because she was that much smarter than everybody else, and she knew it.
translation.ja: よく笑ってた 自分が賢いことを知ってた

translation.en: I wish you'd tell me something about your life, Iris.
translation.ja: 君の話をしてくれ　アイリス

translation.en: When we get to Lake Hazen,
there's gonna be every kind of food there.
translation.ja: いろんな食べ物がある

translation.en: We keep going in that direction.
Just going where Sanchez tells me to go.
Nothing yet. It's just a glitch.
translation.ja: 何もない　ただの不具合だ

translation.en: Until someone tells me different, Tom.
This is the spaceship Aether returning from Jupiter Mission. - Can you hear me? - Yes.
translation.ja: こちらアイテル号 聞こえますか？

translation.en: This is Lake Hazen Weather Station.
translation.ja: こちらヘイゼン湖測候所

translation.en: Lake Hazen, I can't tell you how happy I am to hear your voice.
translation.ja: 声が聞けて すごくうれしいわ

translation.en: For some reason, you're the only person who wants to talk to me.
We've lost contact with NASA and everyone else.
Do you have information on our transmission blackout?
translation.ja: 交信途絶の理由をご存じで？

translation.en: How much have you picked up about the conditions on Earth?
translation.ja: どこまで地球の現状を？

translation.en: I'm sorry, Lake Hazen, I missed that last transmission.
Lake Hazen, are you receiving this?
translation.ja: ヘイゼン湖　応答を

translation.en: I don't know all the details. I know it was a mistake.
translation.ja: 詳細は知らないが 間違いだった

translation.en: - What is it? - I can't pull it up on radar.
translation.ja: どうした？ レーダーが

translation.en: - Can you rotate on this axis? - Trying now.
translation.ja: 回避できるか？ やってる

translation.en: It's what happens when you fly in the goddamn dark.
Aether? Mission Specialist Sullivan, do you copy? Hello?
translation.ja: アイテル スペシャリスト･サリヴァン 応答せよ

translation.en: Lake Hazen, can you hear me?
Stay on current to assess any damage beyond the comms.
translation.ja: 現状維持で被害の算定を

translation.en: Contained. There's damage to a lab wall.
translation.ja: 被害なし　ラボの壁に損傷

translation.en: What's the status on secondary and tertiary communications?

translation.ja: 通信もレーダーも 機能してない

translation.en: Full reports on all systems, and let's at least get the radar fixed.
translation.ja: 全システムの報告と レーダーの修理を
通信システム 〝ダメージ算定中〞
〝危険レベル〞 危機的だな

translation.en: But it's gonna take a walk outside.
Stole it from the LM platform support.
translation.ja: 月着陸船(ＬＭ)から盗んだの

translation.en: NASA can worry about how to unload their supply canisters when we get back.
translation.ja: ＮＡＳＡには 帰還後に説明する

translation.en: What do you think of the name Caroline?
Should come in under the deadline.
I've been thinking. It's gotta be me and Maya going out.
Okay, I'll probably tag along, help carry that thing.
translation.ja: 俺も行く 運ぶのを手伝うよ

translation.en: There's no gravity out there. It's not gonna be too heavy for us girls to handle.
translation.ja: 無重力だから 女性でも運べるわ

translation.en: I don't like to miss a chance to stroll around the block.
translation.ja: 俺も船外を散歩したい

translation.en: Is he going because he's worried about you or because I've never walked before?
translation.ja: 彼はサリーが心配なの？ それとも初心者の私？

translation.en: You've trained for this. He wouldn't send you out if he wasn't sure you could do it.
translation.ja: 訓練を受けたでしょ 不安なら彼も許可しない

translation.en: Good. As long as one of us is.
translation.ja: よかった 自信ないけど

translation.en: I mean, she's so small. Where does it all keep coming from?
translation.ja: あんな小さい体で よく吐くな

translation.en: Now you know how I feel.
Do it now before you secure the helmet. It's a bitch to get off.
translation.ja: ヘルメットを固定したら もう吐けないぞ

translation.en: We can go as fast or slow as you're comfortable out here.
translation.ja: ゆっくりで構わないから

translation.en: That goes for you too, Sully.
The installation site should be coming up.
Got eyes on the antenna site.
Hey, Sully. What do you think of the name Florence?
translation.ja: サリー　フローレンスは？

translation.en: The kids would call her Flo.
We've got some detached wires, but the nose is intact.
translation.ja: ワイヤーが切れてるけど 鼻の部分は無傷

translation.en: I'm sorry? Did you say the nose?
Yeah, I think I might have the song for you.
Uh, right here. Here you go. Enjoy, kids.
translation.ja: いくぞ　楽しんでくれ

translation.en: Okay, Mitchell, let's see if we've got any radar.
Copy that. Give me a second.
translation.ja: 了解　ちょっと待て
いいぞ　再起動した

translation.en: I am in the wrong profession.
I've been saying that for two years.
Yeah, just let me finish this last connection.
Let's get back and see who wants to talk to us.
translation.ja: 戻って交信してみよう

translation.en: - Sully, you take the lead. - Okay.

translation.ja: よくやった サンチェス

translation.en: Can't tell about comms, but radar looks like--
translation.ja: 通信システムはともかく レーダーは…

translation.en: Ade, you need to move fast. You need to go.
- Get out of there. - Go now, Ade!
- Maya! Get out of there now! - I'm stuck!
translation.ja: マヤ　急げ！ とれない

translation.en: Is everybody all right? Everybody safe?
translation.ja: みんな大丈夫か？ ケガはない？

translation.en: - You okay? - Son of a bitch!
translation.ja: 無事か？ クソッ！　ビックリした
クソッ！　ビックリした

translation.en: Okay, okay. Let's get inside before Maya breaks something else.
translation.ja: マヤが何か壊す前に 船内に戻ろう
レーダーは作動　それから…

translation.en: Punching in now. Fingers crossed on comms.
translation.ja: やってみるぞ　祈ってくれ

translation.en: I am gonna celebrate the first and last time I walk in space.
translation.ja: 最初で最後の 宇宙遊泳を祝して

translation.en: No, no, I'm gonna have two drinks.
translation.ja: やっぱり２杯 飲もう

translation.en: We could all use a drink.
Sanchez, have med- pack ready to meet us in the airlock.
translation.ja: エアロックに救急パックを
サンチェスが行く マヤの酸素濃度低下

translation.en: Ade, her oxygen levels are falling fast.
translation.ja: サンチェスが行く マヤの酸素濃度低下 サンチェスが行く マヤの酸素濃度低下 〝マヤ〞

translation.en: - What did I do wrong? - You didn't do anything wrong.
translation.ja: 私 ヘマをした？ してないわ

translation.en: - Just breathe, Maya. - Sanchez, get that med- pack in here!
translation.ja: 呼吸して 救急パックを

translation.en: I'm with you. Look at me. I'm with you.
translation.ja: ここにいるわ　しっかりして

translation.en: - I'm gonna take your helmet off. - Okay. - Okay? You're gonna be fine. - Okay.
translation.ja: ヘルメットをとるわ 大丈夫だから

translation.en: How long have we got? That's it.
- That's too much blood. - It's okay.
translation.ja: すごい出血 大丈夫よ

translation.en: - There's too much blood. - You're okay.
- We don't have time. Put pressure. - Here? Hang on.
There's too much blood. Too much blood.
- I got it. - You're gonna be fine. Okay?
translation.ja: 大丈夫　きっと助かるから

translation.en: Puncture wound to the lower back.
- You're gonna be fine. Yes. - No.
- Maya. - Why won't the blood stop?
- Maya. - I have to stay here.
- Okay, hold on. - Mitchell, get us ready.
Maya. Keep looking at me. Maya. Maya. Breathe.
translation.ja: マヤ　私を見て マヤ 呼吸して
お願い お願いだから

translation.en: Lake Hazen, this is Aether. Are you receiving?
translation.ja: ヘイゼン湖　聞こえますか？

translation.en: Captain, we just got our first view of Earth.
translation.ja: 船長 地球が見えてきた

translation.en: I tied into the signals of the old Astron satellite telescope.
translation.ja: これはアストロンの 宇宙望遠鏡の画像だ

translation.en: Lake Hazen, this is Aether. Are you receiving?
translation.ja: ヘイゼン湖　聞こえますか？

translation.en: Lake Hazen, this is Aether. Are you receiving this transmission?
translation.ja: こちらアイテル号 受信していますか？

translation.en: We're operational now and just got a visual on Earth.
translation.ja: 今は復旧して 地球が見えてます

translation.en: I'm afraid we didn't do a good job of looking after the place while you were away.
translation.ja: 君らの留守中に 地球を守れなかった

translation.en: Do you see any new data that suggests possible safe entry points for us?
translation.ja: 私たちが安全に 進入できる地点は？
生存可能な場所は地下だけ

translation.en: Does this make sense to you?
If we want to get back to K- 23, yes.
It's actually a pretty good plan.
then make gravity our friend to save fuel on the turnaround.
translation.ja: 燃料を節約して転回する

translation.en: - Why would we do that? - There's nothing left for us down there.
translation.ja: なぜだ？ 地球は終わりよ

translation.en: - We're not slingshotting back into space. - We'll die if we go back.
translation.ja: 俺は地球に戻りたい 死ぬわ

translation.en: - He's still alive. - Poles will be the last areas hit.
- Air contamination is rising. - We don't know anything.
translation.ja: 大気汚染が まだ不明だ

translation.en: We all saw what it looked like.
Our mission was to go to K- 23, turn around, and come home.
translation.ja: 地球に戻るまでが 俺たちの任務だ

translation.en: Lake Hazen, are you still picking this up?
translation.ja: ヘイゼン湖　聞こえますか？

translation.en: Lake Hazen, this is Aether Flight Commander Gordon Adewole.
translation.ja: 私はアデウォレ船長だ

translation.en: Your numbers are intriguing, but they have me curious as to how you came up with them,
translation.ja: あなたは どうやって あの数値を出した？

translation.en: and how you know so much about our flight plan.
translation.ja: なぜ飛行計画に詳しい？
オーガスティン･ロフタス

translation.en: I had hoped to meet you upon our return.
Unfortunately, that seems less likely as of the last few days.
translation.ja: この数日で可能性は 低くなりましたが

translation.en: Given your location, are you certain there are no safe regions in the southern hemisphere?
translation.ja: その位置を考えると 南半球に安全地帯はないと？

translation.en: We'll discuss our options up here and hopefully, speak again.
translation.ja: 全員で今後の相談をします

translation.en: There is a message for you.
Um, I don't know if you know what's going on down here,
translation.ja: 地球で何が起きてるか 知らないと思うけど―

translation.en: but, um, we're being asked to evacuate.
translation.ja: 避難するように言われてる

translation.en: I want you to know where we're going,
because I won't be able to contact you anymore.
translation.ja: もう連絡できないから
あなたを心から愛してるわ

translation.en: It's funny when I think about how long I've been doing this.
translation.ja: 何だか おかしな気分だ

translation.en: You know, 20 years ago, Kath and I,
we used to talk about the risks.
A certain amount of danger is involved, and…
I was the one that was supposed to be at risk.
translation.ja: 危険にさらされるのは俺で

translation.en: And they were supposed to be safe.
You have two reentry pods on this ship, and I'd like to take one of them.
translation.ja: 再突入ポッドを １基使わせてくれ

translation.en: It's your job to turn the ship around, start a new life. Do better this time.
translation.ja: この船を方向転換して 新生活を始めることだ

translation.en: to keep a promise that I made to my family.
- It takes two to fly that. - I'll manage.
translation.ja: ２人 必要だ 大丈夫さ

translation.en: I'm going to go with you.
- Why would you wanna do that? - I've been thinking.
Been thinking a lot about time…
and how it gets used and why.
translation.ja: 時間をどのように使うか

translation.en: Why one person lives a lifetime and another only gets a few years.
translation.ja: ある人は寿命を全うし ある人は数年で終わる

translation.en: My daughter, Maria, she died when she was four.
She would have been the same age as Maya.
Sometimes at night, when I couldn't sleep, I would pretend that they were friends.
translation.ja: 夜 眠れないときに想像した ２人が友達だったらと

translation.en: They'd talk about school together. Or boys.
translation.ja: 話題は学校や男子のことだ

translation.en: I want to take Maya home.
It seems like the best use of my time.
translation.ja: いい時間の使い方だろう

translation.en: So I was thinking I'll take a ride home with my buddy, if that's okay.
translation.ja: よければ一緒に帰りたい

translation.en: Take care of yourself, okay? And our little Caroline.
translation.ja: 元気でな　キャロラインも

translation.en: I hope you find your family.
This is Aether. Are you receiving?
translation.ja: こちらアイテル 聞こえますか？

translation.en: Dr. Lofthouse, can you hear me?
translation.ja: 博士　聞こえますか？

translation.en: We're headed into an ionization blackout, so I'm gonna lose you soon.
translation.ja: もうすぐ 通信が途絶するので―

translation.en: But I wanted to contact you first to thank you.
translation.ja: 博士に お礼を言いたくて

translation.en: Commander Adewole and I are turning back.
Captain Mitchell and Specialist Sanchez decided on reentry.
translation.ja: ミッチェルとサンチェスは 再突入を

translation.en: Flight Engineer Maya Lawrence, she suffered an accident during the flight.
translation.ja: マヤは飛行中の事故で 亡くなりました

translation.en: You discovered so much up here.
Well, you pointed to an incredible world.
I wish you could have seen it.
Lake Hazen will have to do.
How did you end up there?
I thought maybe I could help someone.
translation.ja: 誰かを救えると思った

translation.en: You know, you're one of the reasons I joined the space program.
translation.ja: 博士の影響で この道を選んだの

translation.en: You had done some work with my mother, Jean Sullivan.
translation.ja: 母は博士も知ってるジーンよ

translation.en: She brought home a moon rock you gave her.
translation.ja: 月の石をくれたでしょ

translation.en: I thought it was the most amazing thing ever.
It made me want to go up and find more.
I wish I could have thanked you for it in person, Dr. Lofthouse.
translation.ja: 博士には直接 お礼をしたかった

translation.en: It's very nice to finally meet you.
The colony site, it feels like Colorado.
translation.ja: コロニーは まるでコロラド

translation.en: Have you ever been there, to the mountains?
The air is so crisp, and…
translation.ja: 空気が とても爽やかで―

translation.en: and the planet has that smell.
It's like pine trees are hidden somewhere underground, waiting to burst through.
translation.ja: 地中の松の木が 飛び出すのを待ってる感じ

translation.en: I kept looking up, expecting to see a blue sky, but it was orange
translation.ja: 青空を期待してたけど オレンジ色だった

translation.en: from the light reflecting off Jupiter.
translation.ja: 木星に光が反射した色よ

translation.en: When the orbit is just right,
you're sure you could almost touch it.
And that light, it makes all the colors explode, everything.
translation.ja: その光は 全ての色を輝かせる

translation.en: It's like landing in Oz and seeing real color for the first time.
translation.ja: オズの国で 初めて本当の色を見た感じ

translation.en: I've never seen anything so beautiful.
I guess it's just us now.
